long_description: Ready for aerodynamic action, REI Powerflyte tights for tall men offer stretchy outdoor comfort in the face of impending cabin fever. Active fit with 4-way stretch is perfect for cool-weather outdoor training, and the men's tall REI Powerflyte tights also work great as a base layer in warm weather. Very comfortable fabric features a moisture-wicking brushed inner face and a smooth, quick-drying outer face. Fabric protects skin from too much UV light with a UPF factor of 50+. Elastic waistband with adjustable drawcord offers an extremely comfortable fit. You'll go farther without discomfort thanks to flat seams placed to work with your stride. Reflective logo. Envelope pocket stores accessories.
short_description: Ready for aerodynamic action, REI Powerflyte tights for tall men offer stretchy outdoor comfort in the face of impending cabin fever.
